thread.title: Nike.com & Converse.com: 25% Off Clearance = Women’s Chuck Taylor Shoes Only $22.48 (Reg. $50)
thread.title_full: Nike.com & Converse.com: 25% Off Clearance = Women’s Chuck Taylor Shoes Only $22.48 (Reg. $50)

author: Kimberly (Stylish Sidekick)
title: Nike.com & Converse.com: 25% Off Clearance = Women’s Chuck Taylor Shoes Only $22.48 (Reg. $50)

organizations.name: converse chuck taylor all star low tops

text:
Today is the last day Nike.com and Converse.com are both offering 25% off clearance items when you use the code LEGEND25 at checkout. And if you have a Nike+ account (it’s free to sign up if you’re not yet a member), you’ll score free shipping on every order; otherwise, shipping is $8 or free on orders of $150 or more.
As one idea, these Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Low Tops – Women’s Shoes are on sale for just $29.97 (regularly $50) – making them only $22.48 after the code LEGEND25 at checkout!

As another idea, these Converse Chuck II High Top – Infant/Toddler Shoes are on sale for just $24.97 (regularly $40) – making them only $18.73 after the code LEGEND25 at checkout!
